blocks.name: cshco
blocks.content: Mapping of words commutes with the "cyclical shift" operation. (Contributed by AV, 12-Nov-2018.)

  jca(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), wf(c3, c1, c4)), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))))

  0elfz(c2)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), wf(c3, c1, c4))
  swrdco(c0, c1, nat0, c2, c3, c4)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), wf(c3, c1, c4), wceq(ccom(c3, co(c0, cpfx, c2)), ccom(c3, co(c0, csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)))))
  coeq2d(c3, co(c0, cpfx, c2), co(c0, csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)))))

  pfxval(c0, cword(c1), c2)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), wf(c3, c1, c4)), wceq(co(ccom(c3, c0), cpfx, c2), co(ccom(c3, c0), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2))), wa(wcel(ccom(c3, c0), universe), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  jca(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), wf(c3, c1, c4)), wcel(ccom(c3, c0), universe), wcel(c2, cn0))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), wf(c3, c1, c4)), wcel(ccom(c3, c0), universe), wa(wfun(c3), wcel(c0, cword(c1))))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), wf(c3, c1, c4), wa(wfun(c3), wcel(c0, cword(c1))))

  anim2i(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wf(c3, c1, c4), wfun(c3))
  ffun(c3, c1, c4)
  cofunexg(c3, c0, cword(c1))
